## JsPlumbInstance.addEndpoints() method

Add a set of Endpoints to an element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addEndpoints(el: T["E"], endpoints: Array<EndpointOptions<T["E"]>>, referenceParams?: EndpointOptions<T["E"]>): Array<Endpoint>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | T\["E"\] | Element to add the Endpoints to. |
|  endpoints | Array&lt;[EndpointOptions](./core.endpointoptions)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt;&gt; | Array of endpoint options. |
|  referenceParams | [EndpointOptions](./core.endpointoptions)<!-- -->&lt;T\["E"\]&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Array&lt;[Endpoint](./core.endpoint)<!-- -->&gt;
